title: Puzzle Sounds - Audio Pack
description: 100+ High Quality audio for your puzzle game!
longDescription:
Hi There!


This is a pack of audio for puzzle games! Here you'll find sounds of pieces moving, matching, fails, and hits (one piece hit with another). There's a lot of different styles here, some sounds are digital, some sounds are physical, and some of them remember a little bit of magic.


Hope you like it! Here's the list:


  1. Pieces_Match_v1
  2. Pieces_Match_v2
  3. Pieces_Match_v3
  4. Pieces_Match_v4
  5. Pieces_Match_v5
  6. Pieces_Match_v6
  7. Pieces_Match_v7
  8. Pieces_Match_v8
  9. Pieces_Match_v9
  10. Pieces_Match_v10
  11. Pieces_Match_v11
  12. Move_Pieces_v1
  13. Move_Pieces_v2
  14. Move_Pieces_v3
  15. Move_Pieces_v4
  16. Move_Pieces_v5
  17. Move_Pieces_v6

  19. Move_Pieces_v8
  20. Move_Pieces_v9
  21. Move_Pieces_v10
  22. Move_Pieces_v11
  23. Fail_v1

  26. Fail_v4
  27. Fail_v5

Check The preview

Check the documentation


All the folder contains a variation of the main audio file, that you're not paying for :) The price is for the main list above only


﻿License:

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to claim as your own work.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 115

Number of Audio Cues: 115

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,000

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The font used is BigFish free ditributed for commercial use by 1001 fonts and the image is also free for commercial use distributed by unsplash
